title: Development of a standard evaluation method for microbial UV sensitivity using light-emitting diodes
content:
Publication date: 30 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 6

Author(s): Kai Ishida, Yushi Onoda, Yasuko Kadomura-Ishikawa, Miharu Nagahashi, Michiyo Yamashita, Shiho Fukushima, Toshihiko Aizawa, Shigeharu Yamauchi, Yasuo Fujikawa, Tomotake Tanaka, Takashi Uebanso, Masatake Akutagawa, Kazuaki Mawatari, Akira Takahashi
